abilities.name: Mana Break
abilities.description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burned. Passively grants spell resistance.
abilities.notes: Does not stack with other mana break abilities.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.
abilities.notes: Anti-Mage briefly disappears from the map during the blink.

abilities.name: Counterspell
abilities.description: Passively grants magic resistance. When activated, creates an anti-magic shell around Anti-Mage that reflects targeted enemy spells back to their caster.
abilities.notes: Only reflects targeted spells, not area spells.

abilities.name: Mana Void
abilities.description: Creates a dangerous antimagic field at a target's location that deals damage for each point of mana missing from the target. Nearby enemies also take damage.
abilities.notes: Deals damage based on the target's missing mana, not current mana.

abilities.name: Berserker's Call
abilities.description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.
abilities.notes: Forces enemies to attack Axe even if they are spell immune.

abilities.name: Battle Hunger
abilities.description: Drives an enemy unit mad with hunger, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. While the target has Battle Hunger on it, Axe gains bonus movement speed.
abilities.notes: Damage stops if the target kills a unit. Axe gains movement speed for every enemy affected by Battle Hunger.

abilities.name: Counter Helix
abilities.description: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.
abilities.notes: Triggers when attacked, even if the attack misses.

abilities.name: Culling Blade
abilities.description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, instantly killing an enemy unit with low health, or dealing moderate damage otherwise. When an enemy hero is culled, its kill threshold is checked after reductions. If a unit is killed with Culling Blade, Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.
abilities.notes: When Axe successfully kills an enemy hero with Culling Blade, the cooldown is reset.

abilities.name: Enfeeble
abilities.description: Deals damage per second while reducing the affected enemy unit's total attack damage and cast range.
abilities.notes: Reduces total attack damage and cast range. Deals pure damage in 1-second intervals.

abilities.name: Brain Sap
abilities.description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, self-heals and deals pure damage.
abilities.notes: Heals immediately upon cast for damage dealt. Aghanim's Shard makes it an area ability affecting all enemies in radius and reduces cooldown to 14/12/10/8.

abilities.name: Nightmare
abilities.description: Puts the affected unit to sleep. Units affected are awaken when damaged. If the affected unit was directly attacked, the Nightmare is passed to the attacking unit.
abilities.notes: Can be cast on allies (disable help prevents this). The affected unit is invulnerable for the first second. Grants Bane bonus attack speed when attacking nightmared units. Has a sub-ability to end Nightmare.

abilities.name: Fiend's Grip
abilities.description: Grips and disables an enemy unit. Deals damage and steals mana correspondingly of the affected unit's max mana per interval.
abilities.notes: Channeled ability that damages, drains mana, and disables. Heals and restores mana based on damage dealt and mana drained. Aghanim's Scepter creates illusions that also channel Fiend's Grip, reduces cooldown to 75/65/55.

innate_abilities.name: Ichor of Nyctasha
innate_abilities.description: Nyctasha has an obsession with making sure Bane's attributes are always evenly distributed.
innate_abilities.notes: Can be bestowed by Illusions. Neither affected nor disabled by Break. Affects all attribute sources including items.

innate_abilities.name: Hero Model
innate_abilities.description: Bane is considered a ground unit, despite its hero model showing otherwise. He also has the ability to attack Nightmare affected units without transferring Nightmare to itself.
innate_abilities.notes: Can be bestowed by Illusions. Neither affected nor disabled by Break. All damage instances from Bane and its illusions do not wake up Nightmare affected units, except Fiend's Grip.

abilities.name: Bloodrage
abilities.description: Causes the affected unit to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of its health per second.
abilities.notes: Causes a percentage of max health self-damage (non-lethal). Grants spell damage amplification and attack speed. Bloodseeker gets double attack speed when self-cast. Aghanim's Scepter adds 3% of target's max health as pure damage per hit. Aghanim's Shard adds 35 pure damage per attack.

abilities.name: Blood Rite
abilities.description: The ritual completes after a delay, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.
abilities.notes: Creates a visible area effect. Grants vision around the effect radius upon cast.

abilities.name: Thirst
abilities.description: Sensing blood of the mortally wounded, Bloodseeker gains bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below a certain threshold, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. These insatiable bonuses stack per hero.
abilities.notes: Unlocks maximum movement speed for Bloodseeker. Grants True Sight over enemies below 25% health. Adds Bloodrush active component that temporarily boosts move speed and healing.

abilities.name: Rupture
abilities.description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.
abilities.notes: Deals initial damage based on current health. Damage from movement is based on distance traveled. Uses charges instead of traditional cooldown. Roshan is immune to this ability.

innate_abilities.name: Sanguivore
innate_abilities.description: The seeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, and self-heals for the max health of the killed unit, or if Bloodseeker's allies kill a nearby enemy hero.
innate_abilities.notes: Can be bestowed by Illusions. Neither affected nor disabled by Break. Affected by Heal and Lifesteal Manipulation sources. Aghanim's Shard converts overheal into damage barrier. Aghanim's Scepter allows Bloodseeker to heal from pure damage dealt.

abilities.name: Crystal Nova
abilities.description: Creates a blast of damaging frost that slows enemy movement and attack speed in an area.
abilities.notes: Slows attack and movement speed of all enemies in the area of effect.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, preventing movement and attack while dealing damage over time.
abilities.notes: Target cannot move or attack, but can still cast spells.

abilities.name: Arcane Aura
abilities.description: Provides bonus mana regeneration to all allied heroes globally. Crystal Maiden receives additional regeneration.
abilities.notes: Affects all allied heroes globally, including creep-heroes.

abilities.name: Freezing Field
abilities.description: Crystal Maiden channels energy to unleash waves of damaging frost that slow attack and movement speed. Explosions happen randomly in the area of effect.
abilities.notes: Crystal Maiden is unable to move or perform actions during this channeled ultimate.

innate_abilities.name: Blueheart Floe
innate_abilities.description: Grants the Maiden incoming mana regeneration amplification.
innate_abilities.notes: This ability levels up with Freezing Field.

abilities.name: Frost Arrows
abilities.description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement.
abilities.notes: Can be manually cast as an attack modifier.

abilities.name: Gust
abilities.description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemies. Knockback distance and duration are the same at all levels.
abilities.notes: Enemies are silenced during the knockback and after they land.

abilities.name: Multishot
abilities.description: Drow releases a volley of arrows at nearby enemies in a cone in front of her.
abilities.notes: The arrows are released in a cone directly in front of Drow.

abilities.name: Marksmanship
abilities.description: Drow's knowledge of weak spots increases her chance of dealing extra damage with her arrows. When an enemy hero comes close, Marksmanship bonus is temporarily disabled.
abilities.notes: Provides bonus agility to nearby ranged allied heroes.

innate_abilities.name: Precision Aura
innate_abilities.description: Grants nearby ranged allied heroes a lesser bonus Agility agility.
innate_abilities.notes: This ability levels up with Drow Ranger and Marksmanship.

abilities.name: Fissure
abilities.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.
abilities.notes: Creates an impassable wall that blocks both allies and enemies.

abilities.name: Enchant Totem
abilities.description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.
abilities.notes: With Aghanim's Scepter, allows Earthshaker to leap to a target location.

abilities.name: Aftershock
abilities.description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stun to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
abilities.notes: Triggers when Earthshaker casts any of his abilities.

abilities.name: Echo Slam
abilities.description: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units. Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby enemies.
abilities.notes: Damage depends on the number of enemies in range, as each enemy hit creates an echo.

innate_abilities.name: Spirit Cairn
innate_abilities.description: Creates a cairn upon Earthshaker's death that grants self experience, vision radius centered around it, and acts as a pathing blocker.
innate_abilities.notes: Destroys the Spirit Cairn once Earthshaker respawns.

abilities.name: Blade Fury
abilities.description: Juggernaut spins his blade, becoming immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.
abilities.notes: Grants spell immunity during the spin duration.

abilities.name: Healing Ward
abilities.description: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health. The ward can be moved after being summoned.
abilities.notes: The ward can be targeted and killed by enemies, giving gold and experience.

abilities.name: Blade Dance
abilities.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.
abilities.notes: Grants increased critical strike chance and damage.

abilities.name: Omnislash
abilities.description: Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 200-225 damage per slash. The number of slashes increases with levels.
abilities.notes: Juggernaut is invulnerable during Omnislash.

innate_abilities.name: Swiftslash
innate_abilities.description: A weaker version of Omnislash that becomes available when Juggernaut purchases Aghanim's Scepter.
innate_abilities.notes: Requires Aghanim's Scepter. Shares cooldown with Omnislash.

abilities.name: Starstorm
abilities.description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana will be struck twice.
abilities.notes: The second hit strikes the closest valid target to Mirana.

abilities.name: Sacred Arrow
abilities.description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, stunning and dealing damage to the first enemy unit it hits. The stun duration and damage increase with distance traveled, up to a maximum.
abilities.notes: Arrow damage and stun increases with distance traveled up to a maximum.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, granting bonus attack and movement speed to allied units upon landing.
abilities.notes: Provides temporary bonus movement and attack speed to nearby allies.

abilities.name: Moonlight Shadow
abilities.description: Bathes Mirana and nearby allied heroes in moonlight, granting them invisibility. Invisibility is not lost when casting non-damaging spells.
abilities.notes: Invisibility is lost when attacking or using damaging items/abilities.

abilities.name: Waveform
abilities.description: Morphling dissolves into a fast-moving wave, damaging enemy units in his path. Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.
abilities.notes: Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.

abilities.name: Adaptive Strike (Agility)
abilities.description: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing damage and knocking them back. Effect is based on Morphling's agility/strength ratio.
abilities.notes: Knockback and damage increases with Agility ratio.

abilities.name: Adaptive Strike (Strength)
abilities.description: Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning them and dealing damage. Effect is based on Morphling's strength/agility ratio.
abilities.notes: Stun duration increases with Strength ratio.

abilities.name: Morph
abilities.description: Morphling shifts his form, trading Strength for Agility or Agility for Strength.
abilities.notes: Mana cost is per second.

abilities.name: Morph Replicate
abilities.description: Morphling changes form to match the targeted unit, copying its non-ultimate abilities. When the morph ends, Morphling reverts to his normal form.
abilities.notes: Morphling can only target enemy or allied heroes.

abilities.name: Shadowraze (Near)
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemies in the area.
abilities.notes: Applies a stack that causes subsequent Shadowrazes to deal more damage.

abilities.name: Shadowraze (Medium)
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground at medium distance in front of him, dealing damage to enemies in the area.
abilities.notes: Applies a stack that causes subsequent Shadowrazes to deal more damage.

abilities.name: Shadowraze (Far)
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground far in front of him, dealing damage to enemies in the area.
abilities.notes: Applies a stack that causes subsequent Shadowrazes to deal more damage.

abilities.name: Necromastery
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend captures the souls of units that die near him, gaining bonus damage for each soul.
abilities.notes: Half of the souls are lost on death. Can gain souls from denies.

abilities.name: Requiem of Souls
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy, dealing damage to enemies near him. Enemies hit have their movement speed and attack damage reduced. Shadow Fiend gains movement speed for each enemy hero hit.
abilities.notes: Damage depends on the number of souls collected through Necromastery.

innate_abilities.name: Presence of the Dark Lord
innate_abilities.description: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemy units.
innate_abilities.notes: Affects all enemy units in the area, including buildings.

abilities.name: Spirit Lance
abilities.description: Phantom Lancer hurls a magical lance at a target that damages and slows it. After the impact, an image of the Phantom Lancer appears, attacking the target.
abilities.notes: Creates a single illusion that lasts a few seconds.

abilities.name: Doppelganger
abilities.description: Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After a short delay, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two new illusions.
abilities.notes: Can use this to dodge projectiles and disjoint targeted abilities.

abilities.name: Phantom Rush
abilities.description: When targeting an enemy outside of attack range, Phantom Lancer quickly charges at the target to attack. Resets the attack timer on start.
abilities.notes: Grants bonus agility when charging at the target.

abilities.name: Juxtapose
abilities.description: Allows Phantom Lancer and his illusions a chance to create an illusion when attacking. Illusions created by this ability can create more illusions.
abilities.notes: Limited by maximum number of illusions.

abilities.name: Illusory Orb
abilities.description: Puck launches a magic orb that travels in a straight line, dealing damage to enemy units along the way. While the orb is in motion, Puck can launch itself to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
abilities.notes: Provides flying vision along its path.

abilities.name: Waning Rift
abilities.description: Puck releases a burst of dust that deals damage and silences enemy units in an area around it.
abilities.notes: Silences all enemies in the area of effect.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm and hidden from enemies.
abilities.notes: Can be used to disjoint projectiles and dodge damage.

abilities.name: Ethereal Jaunt
abilities.description: Puck teleports to where its Illusory Orb is currently located.
abilities.notes: Can only be used while Illusory Orb is in flight.

abilities.name: Dream Coil
abilities.description: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for a short duration. If the enemy heroes move too far from the center, the coil will snap, dealing additional damage and applying a longer stun.
abilities.notes: With Aghanim's Scepter, Dream Coil stun pierces spell immunity, and increases duration and stun.

abilities.name: Meat Hook
abilities.description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will grab the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.
abilities.notes: Provides vision along its path and can grab units through trees and terrain.

abilities.name: Rot
abilities.description: A toxic cloud of gas that deals damage per second to enemy units around Pudge, as well as slowing both enemies and allies. Pudge himself takes only half the damage. Rot can be toggled on and off.
abilities.notes: Pudge takes half damage from Rot. Tapping the ability quickly will only deal a single instance of damage.

abilities.name: Flesh Heap
abilities.description: Gives Pudge increased magic resistance and bonus strength that increases permanently each time Pudge kills an enemy hero or the enemy hero dies in his vicinity. Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.
abilities.notes: Grants retroactive strength when skilled based on kills that happened before skilling it.

abilities.name: Dismember
abilities.description: Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage per second based on Pudge's Strength. Lasts 3 seconds on enemy heroes, 6 seconds on creeps.
abilities.notes: Restores Pudge's health based on the damage dealt during Dismember. Increases damage per second based on Pudge's Strength.

abilities.name: Plasma Field
abilities.description: Razor releases a wave of energetic plasma that damages enemy units in the area. The wave deals damage to enemies based on how far they are from Razor, dealing maximum damage at the edge of the effect.
abilities.notes: The maximum damage is dealt at the edge of the effect.

abilities.name: Static Link
abilities.description: Razor links himself to a target enemy hero, stealing damage over time while the link is active. The link breaks if the enemy moves out of range or Razor is silenced.
abilities.notes: Damage remains stolen until the duration ends, even if the link is broken.

abilities.name: Unstable Current
abilities.description: Razor moves with increased speed as electrical energy builds up in his armor. Enemy units that cast a targeted spell on Razor are struck by lightning, damaging them and applying a brief slow.
abilities.notes: Punishes enemies who target Razor with spells.

abilities.name: Eye of the Storm
abilities.description: Summons an electrical storm centered around Razor that strikes nearby enemy units with lightning every second, damaging them and reducing their armor.
abilities.notes: Lightning strikes the closest enemy unit to Razor. Can damage buildings but deals reduced damage.

abilities.name: Burrowstrike
abilities.description: Sand King burrows into the ground and resurfaces at a target location, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces. Burrowstrike travels in a straight line, and the stun duration is the same on each level.
abilities.notes: Disjoint projectiles upon cast.

abilities.name: Sand Storm
abilities.description: Sand King creates a fierce sand storm, damaging all enemies caught within it. Sand King becomes invisible while in the sandstorm.
abilities.notes: Sand King becomes invisible while in Sand Storm.

abilities.name: Caustic Finale
abilities.description: Sand King's attacks infect the target with a poisonous sting that slows their movement speed. If the target dies while under this effect, it explodes, damaging nearby enemies.
abilities.notes: If the target dies while under the effect, it deals AoE damage.

abilities.name: Epicenter
abilities.description: After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends out a series of damaging pulse waves that slow enemies caught in their wake. The slowing effect stacks with each pulse and reaches its maximum value.
abilities.notes: Requires successful channeling. Each pulse increases the slow effect.

abilities.name: Static Remnant
abilities.description: Storm Spirit creates an explosive static remnant that lasts 35 seconds. When an enemy comes within 250 range, the remnant explodes, dealing damage to enemies in a radius.
abilities.notes: Provides vision around the remnant. Triggers when enemies come within 250 range.

abilities.name: Electric Vortex
abilities.description: Storm Spirit creates a vortex that pulls an enemy unit to his location. With Aghanim's Scepter, it affects all enemies in a radius around Storm Spirit.
abilities.notes: With Aghanim's Scepter, affects all enemies in a 475 radius.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge that grants Storm Spirit bonus damage and a slowing effect on his next attack. After the bonus is used, a new charge can be gained by casting another spell.
abilities.notes: Overload charges stack. You can have multiple charges at once.

abilities.name: Ball Lightning
abilities.description: Storm Spirit becomes a ball of lightning, moving at incredible speed across the map. While in Ball Lightning form, he damages enemies he passes through, and is invulnerable to spells and effects. The mana cost includes a flat amount plus a percentage based on the distance traveled.
abilities.notes: Mana cost is based on distance traveled. Initial mana cost plus percentage of max mana per 100 units.

abilities.name: Storm Hammer
abilities.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.
abilities.notes: Deals damage and stuns all targets in a small AoE.

abilities.name: Great Cleave
abilities.description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.
abilities.notes: Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.

abilities.name: Warcry
abilities.description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, granting them bonus armor and movement speed.
abilities.notes: Affects all allied heroes in a 700 radius, including Sven.

abilities.name: God's Strength
abilities.description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting himself bonus damage for 40 seconds. With Aghanim's Scepter, the damage bonus is also granted to all allied heroes.
abilities.notes: With Aghanim's Scepter, grants 75% of the damage bonus to all allied heroes.

abilities.name: Avalanche
abilities.description: Bombards a target area with rocks, dealing damage to enemies in the area 4 times over the duration and stunning them for 0.8 seconds at the beginning.
abilities.notes: Can deal double damage if combined with Toss (when toss lands during avalanche).

abilities.name: Toss
abilities.description: Tiny grabs a nearby unit and tosses it at the target enemy to deal damage in an area. The tossed unit takes damage as well (if it's an enemy). A tossed ally will damage enemies where it lands.
abilities.notes: Grabs the closest unit to Tiny (excluding self). Does damage to both tossed unit and units at the landing area.

abilities.name: Tree Grab
abilities.description: Tiny grabs a tree, gaining bonus attack range, cleave damage, and bonus damage against buildings. The tree is consumed after a number of attacks.
abilities.notes: Tree is consumed after 6 attacks. Grants cleave damage and bonus damage to buildings.

abilities.name: Grow
abilities.description: Tiny gains bonus movement speed but loses attack speed with each level of Grow. He also gains bonus status resistance and increases the effects of his spells.
abilities.notes: Grow is a passive ability that permanently enhances Tiny's other abilities and attributes.

innate_abilities.name: Toss Requires Stone
innate_abilities.description: Toss no longer grabs allied units unless there are no enemies nearby. Instead, when no units are available, Tiny will grab and throw a stone. Stones deal reduced damage but stun for 1 second.

abilities.name: Magic Missile
abilities.description: Vengeful Spirit launches a magic missile at a target enemy unit, dealing damage and stunning the target.
abilities.notes: Cannot be disjointed.

abilities.name: Wave of Terror
abilities.description: Vengeful Spirit sends out a wave that deals damage and reduces armor of enemy units in a line. Provides vision along its path.
abilities.notes: Provides flying vision along its path.

abilities.name: Vengeance Aura
abilities.description: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the damage of nearby allied units. When Vengeful Spirit dies, an illusion of her is created that deals and takes bonus damage.
abilities.notes: When Vengeful Spirit dies, an illusion appears that deals 100% damage but takes 200% damage.

abilities.name: Nether Swap
abilities.description: Instantly swaps positions with a target unit. If an allied unit is swapped, both units gain a damage reduction buff for a few seconds.
abilities.notes: Pierces spell immunity. Does not disjoint projectiles.

abilities.name: Shackleshot
abilities.description: Windranger releases a shot that shackles the first unit it hits to a target behind it. If a valid secondary target is found, the shackle duration is increased.
abilities.notes: If shackled to another unit, the duration is longer. Can shackle to trees and invisible units.

abilities.name: Powershot
abilities.description: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a powerful shot, which deals damage to each enemy in a line. The damage is reduced by each unit hit. Powershot grants vision all along its path.
abilities.notes: Each unit hit reduces damage by 20%. Grants vision along its path.

abilities.name: Windrun
abilities.description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.
abilities.notes: Provides 100% evasion from physical attacks.

abilities.name: Focus Fire
abilities.description: Windranger channels the wind to gain maximum attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with reduced damage.
abilities.notes: With Aghanim's Scepter, the damage reduction is reduced or eliminated.

abilities.name: Arc Lightning
abilities.description: Zeus sends a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units, dealing damage and revealing the area around each target.
abilities.notes: Jumps to the closest enemy unit in radius. Provides vision around each target.

abilities.name: Lightning Bolt
abilities.description: Zeus calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, dealing damage and providing true sight of the target. Provides vision in a small area around the target for a short time.
abilities.notes: Provides true sight of the target for a short time and ministuns it.

abilities.name: Heavenly Jump
abilities.description: Zeus leaps into the air and comes crashing down at the target location, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and briefly slowing them.
abilities.notes: Zeus is invulnerable while jumping. With shard, auto-casts Lightning Bolt on a random enemy.

abilities.name: Thundergod's Wrath
abilities.description: Zeus strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, regardless of where they may be hiding. Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.
abilities.notes: Strikes all enemy heroes on the map, providing vision. With Scepter, creates Nimbus clouds.

innate_abilities.name: Static Field
innate_abilities.description: Zeus's abilities damage all enemy units within a radius around him based on a percentage of their current health.
innate_abilities.notes: Deals extra damage as a percentage of current health to enemies within radius whenever Zeus casts a spell.

innate_abilities.name: Nimbus
innate_abilities.description: With Aghanim's Scepter, Zeus can summon a storm cloud that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on the nearest enemy in range.
innate_abilities.notes: Requires Aghanim's Scepter. Summons a cloud that casts Lightning Bolt on enemies in range.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Summons a torrent that deals damage and launches enemy units into the air. The torrent takes 1.6 seconds to form and erupts for 1 second, at which point it deals damage and tosses enemy units into the air for 1.6 seconds.
abilities.notes: Provides vision at the target area. Has a delay before triggering.

abilities.name: Tidebringer
abilities.description: Kunkka's sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area in front of him for a single strike. The cleave damage is not reduced with distance.
abilities.notes: Cleave damage ignores armor value but not armor type. Can be manually cast.

abilities.name: X Marks the Spot
abilities.description: Kunkka targets an enemy or allied hero, marking their position with an X. After a delay, the marked hero will be called back to the X. Kunkka can trigger the return early by casting Return.
abilities.notes: Can target both enemies and allies. Return can be cast to recall the target early.

abilities.name: Ghostship
abilities.description: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through battle before crashing, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the crash site. Allied heroes near the wreck are given a buff that provides bonus movement speed and delayed damage reduction.
abilities.notes: Allied heroes in the area gain Rum buff, which gives movement speed and stores 50% of damage to be taken later.

abilities.name: Dragon Slave
abilities.description: Lina unleashes a wave of fire in the direction she is facing. The wave damages enemy units in its path.
abilities.notes: The projectile provides vision along its path.

abilities.name: Light Strike Array
abilities.description: Lina summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies in a target area.
abilities.notes: Has a slight delay before the stun and damage are applied.

abilities.name: Fiery Soul
abilities.description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina casts a spell. Stacks with each spell cast, and refreshes duration.
abilities.notes: Stacks up to 3 times. Each stack refreshes the duration independently.

abilities.name: Laguna Blade
abilities.description: Lina unleashes a huge bolt of lightning that deals massive damage to a single enemy. With Aghanim's Scepter, Laguna Blade's damage type becomes Pure and it pierces spell immunity.
abilities.notes: With Aghanim's Scepter, damage type becomes Pure and pierces spell immunity.

abilities.name: Earth Spike
abilities.description: Lion summons a column of spikes from the earth, impaling enemy units on their path and dealing damage. The impaled enemies are stunned and raised into the air for a short period.
abilities.notes: Impales units in a line, stunning and damaging them.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless critter for a few seconds. The transformed unit is slowed, cannot attack, cast spells, or use items.
abilities.notes: Disables the target completely, setting their movement speed to 140.

abilities.name: Mana Drain
abilities.description: Lion drains mana from a target enemy unit, gaining mana for each point drained. The unit being drained is also slowed while the drain is in effect.
abilities.notes: Transfers mana from the target to Lion. Also applies a slow effect.

abilities.name: Finger of Death
abilities.description: Lion channels a powerful energy burst through his finger, dealing massive damage to the target. Each time Finger of Death kills an enemy hero, Lion gains a permanent damage bonus.
abilities.notes: Gains permanent damage for each hero kill. With Aghanim's Scepter, damages enemies in an area.

abilities.name: Ether Shock
abilities.description: Shadow Shaman releases a bolt of electricity that strikes multiple enemy units, dealing damage to each.
abilities.notes: Jumps to the nearest enemies in range. The primary target is always hit.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling its attacks and abilities.
abilities.notes: Hexed units are transformed into frogs, slowed, and unable to attack or cast spells.

abilities.name: Shackles
abilities.description: Shaman channels magical energy, causing stuns and damage to the target enemy unit over time.
abilities.notes: Channeling ability that damages and disables the target as long as Shadow Shaman continues channeling.

abilities.name: Mass Serpent Ward
abilities.description: Summons 8 Serpent Wards in a perimeter around the target point. The wards attack enemy units and structures.
abilities.notes: Serpent Wards deal physical damage and are especially effective against structures.

abilities.name: Guardian Sprint
abilities.description: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster at the cost of taking bonus damage. As an amphibious beast, Slardar has increased regeneration when in the river.
abilities.notes: Slardar moves faster but takes extra damage from spells. Gets bonus speed and regen in river.

abilities.name: Slithereen Crush
abilities.description: Slardar slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units, then applying a slowing effect after the stun.
abilities.notes: Applies a stun followed by a movement and attack speed slow.

abilities.name: Bash of the Deep
abilities.description: Slardar's attacks have a chance to stun the target and deal bonus damage.
abilities.notes: Has a chance to bash enemies on attack, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.

abilities.name: Corrosive Haze
abilities.description: Slardar reduces the armor of an enemy unit and provides vision of that unit for the duration.
abilities.notes: Provides True Sight of the target and significantly reduces their armor. Pierces spell immunity.

abilities.name: Gush
abilities.description: Tidehunter summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing its movement speed and armor for a short duration.
abilities.notes: With Aghanim's Scepter, becomes a cone-shaped AoE spell that can hit multiple enemies.

abilities.name: Kraken Shell
abilities.description: Provides damage block against physical attacks, and removes negative buffs when enough damage has accumulated.
abilities.notes: Blocks damage from physical attacks and periodically dispels debuffs when damage threshold is reached.

abilities.name: Anchor Smash
abilities.description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor, damaging nearby enemies and reducing their attack damage for a duration.
abilities.notes: Reduces the base damage of affected enemies by a percentage. Does not affect bonus damage.

abilities.name: Ravage
abilities.description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in a radius around Tidehunter, damaging and stunning all enemies caught within it.
abilities.notes: The tentacles expand outward from Tidehunter at a speed of 775 units per second.

abilities.name: Paralyzing Cask
abilities.description: Launches a cask of paralyzing potion that bounces between enemy units, stunning and damaging them. The cask's impact deals less damage with each bounce and stuns for half the duration on creeps.
abilities.notes: Bounces between enemies within 575 range. Stuns creeps for 5 seconds, heroes for 1 second.

abilities.name: Voodoo Restoration
abilities.description: Witch Doctor creates a healing aura around himself that restores health to all nearby allied units. Drains mana while active.
abilities.notes: Drains mana per second while active. Initial activation costs mana_cost.

abilities.name: Maledict
abilities.description: Curses enemies in a small area, causing them to take bursts of damage over time based on how much health they have lost since being cursed.
abilities.notes: Deals more damage as the affected unit loses more health during the duration.

abilities.name: Death Ward
abilities.description: Summons a deadly ward to attack nearby enemies. The ward attacks the closest enemy to it with strong, piercing attacks. Lasts up to 8 seconds, but requires Witch Doctor to channel.
abilities.notes: Death Ward deals physical damage, which is reduced by armor. With Aghanim's Scepter, attacks bounce to nearby targets.

abilities.name: Frost Nova
abilities.description: Blasts an enemy unit with ice, dealing damage and slowing its movement and attack speed. The primary target is frozen in place.
abilities.notes: Roots the primary target and slows all enemies in the radius.

abilities.name: Frost Shield
abilities.description: Forms a shield of frost that reduces incoming physical damage and slows the attack speed of enemies who attack the target. Periodically damages nearby enemies.
abilities.notes: Can be cast on buildings. Slows attackers and deals period damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Sinister Gaze
abilities.description: Lich fixates his gaze on a target, causing them to move towards him while being slowed. Steals some of their mana.
abilities.notes: Forces the target to walk towards Lich while being slowed. Drains mana based on target's max mana.

abilities.name: Chain Frost
abilities.description: Unleashes a chain of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units, slowing and damaging them. Each bounce increases the damage. With Aghanim's Scepter, it becomes infinite bounces.
abilities.notes: With Aghanim's Scepter, Chain Frost has unlimited bounces and slows more.

abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.description: Creates a cloud of smoke that silences enemies and causes them to miss most of their attacks.
abilities.notes: Enemies in the cloud are silenced and have a chance to miss their attacks.

abilities.name: Blink Strike
abilities.description: Riki teleports behind the target unit and deals bonus damage with his next attack.
abilities.notes: Puts Riki behind the target. Can be cast on allies.

abilities.name: Backstab
abilities.description: Riki strikes his enemies from behind, dealing bonus damage based on his agility. Backstab damage is applied when attacking from behind.
abilities.notes: Deals bonus damage based on Riki's agility when attacking from behind.

abilities.name: Tricks of the Trade
abilities.description: Riki blinks into his Smoke Screen, or a random point within 500 range, and phases out of the world while rapidly attacking all enemies in a 500 radius around him from the back. Each attack applies Backstab.
abilities.notes: Riki is invulnerable during the duration. Attacks all enemies in radius from their backs.

innate_abilities.name: Cloak and Dagger
innate_abilities.description: Riki permanently has invisibility. If he attacks, he becomes visible briefly. Can be activated to make him visible and increase his movement speed.
innate_abilities.notes: Riki is permanently invisible when not attacking. Attacking breaks invisibility for a short time.

abilities.name: Malefice
abilities.description: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.
abilities.notes: Applies multiple stuns and damage instances over time.

abilities.name: Demonic Conversion
abilities.description: Transforms a creep or lesser life form into three fragments of Enigma himself. These fragments are known as Eidolons. When Eidolons attack 8 times, they multiply, creating a new Eidolon. They last for 35 seconds.
abilities.notes: Eidolons multiply after 8 attacks. Cannot target ancient creeps or heroes.

abilities.name: Midnight Pulse
abilities.description: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging all enemies caught in it based on their max health.
abilities.notes: Deals pure damage based on max health. Goes through spell immunity.

abilities.name: Black Hole
abilities.description: Enigma creates a vortex that sucks in nearby enemies, stunning, damaging and pulling them to its center. The vortex is too powerful for even the strongest units to escape.
abilities.notes: Requires channeling. Pulls and stuns all units in the area.

abilities.name: Laser
abilities.description: Fires a laser at an enemy unit, dealing pure damage and temporarily blinding them, causing them to miss all physical attacks.
abilities.notes: Causes the target to miss all physical attacks. With Aghanim's Scepter, Laser bounces to additional targets.

abilities.name: Heat-Seeking Missile
abilities.description: Launches missiles to track and damage enemy heroes within range.
abilities.notes: Automatically targets visible enemy heroes within range. Multiple missiles can target the same hero if fewer heroes are in range than available missiles.

abilities.name: Defense Matrix
abilities.description: Tinker protects an ally with a high-powered energy forcefield that absorbs a fixed amount of incoming damage. Any excess damage is dealt as normal.
abilities.notes: Absorbs a specific amount of damage before expiring.

abilities.name: Rearm
abilities.description: After channeling for a fixed time, Rearm refreshes the cooldown on most items and abilities.
abilities.notes: Does not refresh items that limited by charges or Black King Bar. With Aghanim's Scepter, reduces channel time significantly.

innate_abilities.name: Keen Teleport
innate_abilities.description: With Aghanim's Shard, Tinker can teleport to a friendly unit, dealing damage to enemies upon arrival.
innate_abilities.notes: Requires Aghanim's Shard to unlock. Deals damage to enemies at the arrival location.

abilities.name: Shrapnel
abilities.description: Fires a ball of shrapnel that explodes at the target area after 1.5 seconds, damaging and slowing enemy units. Reveals the targeted area. Provides vision for the duration.
abilities.notes: Uses charge-based system with maximum of 3 charges. Damages enemies in an area over time while slowing them.

abilities.name: Headshot
abilities.description: Sniper's precision can knock back and slow his target, and has a chance to deal bonus damage on attacks.
abilities.notes: Has a chance to deal bonus damage and slow the target. Knocks back most units other than buildings and rooted units.

abilities.name: Take Aim
abilities.description: Sniper increases his attack range. Can be activated to gain bonus damage and True Strike for a limited time, but reduces his attack range during this time.
abilities.notes: Passively increases attack range. When activated, grants bonus damage and True Strike but reduces attack range.

abilities.name: Assassinate
abilities.description: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot. The attack cannot miss and deals bonus damage based on how far away the target is.
abilities.notes: Has a long cast delay but deals massive damage. With Aghanim's Scepter, damages and stuns all enemies in an area.

abilities.name: Death Pulse
abilities.description: Necrophos releases a wave of death that damages enemy units and heals allied units in the area.
abilities.notes: Damages enemies and heals allies in the same radius.

abilities.name: Ghost Shroud
abilities.description: Necrophos slips into the realm between life and death, becoming immune to physical damage, amplifying healing done to him, and increasing magic damage to/from Necrophos.
abilities.notes: Provides physical damage immunity, but increases magical damage taken. Amplifies healing.

abilities.name: Heartstopper Aura
abilities.description: Necrophos's presence causes nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.
abilities.notes: Deals health removal damage that pierces spell immunity. Works on buildings.

abilities.name: Reaper's Scythe
abilities.description: Necrophos rips away a portion of the enemy hero's life force based on how much life it is missing. If an enemy hero is killed by Reaper's Scythe, they're dead for additional time without buyback.
abilities.notes: Deals damage based on how much health the target is missing. Prevents buyback and adds respawn time if it kills.

innate_abilities.name: Sadist
innate_abilities.description: Necrophos gains health and mana regeneration when he kills an enemy unit. Hero kills provide a greater bonus.
innate_abilities.notes: Grants health and mana regen stacks on kills, with greater bonuses for hero kills.

abilities.name: Fatal Bonds
abilities.description: Binds several enemy units together, causing a percentage of damage dealt to one unit to be felt by all others.
abilities.notes: When a bonded unit takes damage, all other bonded units take a percentage of that damage.

abilities.name: Shadow Word
abilities.description: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing an allied unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.
abilities.notes: Heals allies or damages enemies over time. Cannot be dispelled from allies.

abilities.name: Upheaval
abilities.description: A powerful slowing effect that increases in intensity over time. The effect dissipates when Warlock stops channeling.
abilities.notes: Slow increases the longer Warlock channels. Continues for a short time after channeling stops.

abilities.name: Chaotic Offering
abilities.description: Summons a powerful Golem from the depths of the Void to fight for Warlock. The Golem's landing stuns and deals initial damage. The Golem is a powerful melee unit with high health and damage.
abilities.notes: Summons a powerful Golem. With Aghanim's Scepter, summons an additional Golem.

abilities.name: Wild Axes
abilities.description: Beastmaster launches two axes in a horizontal arc that slice through trees and deal damage to enemy units in their path.
abilities.notes: Deals damage twice if both axes hit the same unit. Cuts down trees in its path.

abilities.name: Call of the Wild Hawk
abilities.description: Beastmaster calls forth a hawk to scout for him. The hawk has flying movement, but is quite fragile.
abilities.notes: Summons a hawk for scouting. Higher levels provide increased vision range.

abilities.name: Call of the Wild Boar
abilities.description: Beastmaster calls forth a boar to join him in battle. The boar attacks enemies and carries a poison attack that slows enemy units.
abilities.notes: Summons a boar that deals physical damage and slows enemies with its poison attack.

abilities.name: Primal Roar
abilities.description: Beastmaster lets loose a mighty roar, stunning a target enemy unit, and creating a shockwave that slows nearby enemies behind it.
abilities.notes: Stuns primary target and creates a cone of slowing effect behind them. Pierces spell immunity.

innate_abilities.name: Inner Beast
innate_abilities.description: Beastmaster's presence increases the attack speed of nearby allied units.
innate_abilities.notes: Passively provides attack speed to nearby allies.

abilities.name: Shadow Strike
abilities.description: Throws a poisoned dagger that deals initial damage and then deals damage over time while slowing the target. The slow diminishes over time.
abilities.notes: Deals a burst of damage on impact, then damage over time. Slowing effect decreases over time.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.
abilities.notes: Allows Queen of Pain to instantly teleport a short distance.

abilities.name: Scream of Pain
abilities.description: Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.
abilities.notes: Damage is done in a radius around Queen of Pain.

abilities.name: Sonic Wave
abilities.description: Queen of Pain releases a deafening sonic wave in front of her, dealing heavy damage to all enemies caught in its path.
abilities.notes: Deals pure damage in a cone in front of Queen of Pain. Pierces spell immunity.

abilities.name: Venomous Gale
abilities.description: Launches a ball of poison that splashes on enemy units, dealing damage over time and slowing their movement and attack speed. The slow takes some time to decay.
abilities.notes: Deals damage over time while slowing. Initial projectile damage, then multiple instances of damage over its duration.

abilities.name: Poison Sting
abilities.description: Venomancer's attacks poison the enemy, dealing damage over time and slowing their movement speed. Plague Wards also apply this poison.
abilities.notes: Basic attacks and Plague Wards apply this poison. Damage is dealt over time.

abilities.name: Plague Ward
abilities.description: Summons a plague ward that attacks enemies, dealing damage and applying Poison Sting. The ward is immune to magic, but vulnerable to physical damage.
abilities.notes: Wards apply poison sting to enemies they attack. Wards have toxic damage type.

abilities.name: Poison Nova
abilities.description: A toxic cloud that expands around Venomancer, dealing heavy poison damage to enemy units over time. Poison Nova deals half damage to illusions.
abilities.notes: The poison slowly decays enemies over a long duration. Nova expands outward from Venomancer.

innate_abilities.name: Latent Toxicity
innate_abilities.description: When Venomancer dies, he releases a noxious cloud that deals damage over time to enemies in the area.
innate_abilities.notes: Passive ability that triggers when Venomancer dies, dealing damage over time in an area.

abilities.name: Time Walk
abilities.description: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken in the last 2 seconds.
abilities.notes: Time Walk dispels Faceless Void upon cast. The damage backtrack does not restore health beyond what Faceless Void had 2 seconds ago.

abilities.name: Time Dilation
abilities.description: Temporarily freezes cooldowns of all abilities and items of enemy heroes in the area. Deals damage and adds a debuff duration for each cooldown frozen.
abilities.notes: Affects enemy heroes in the radius, freezing their ability and item cooldowns and extending them.

abilities.name: Time Lock
abilities.description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, causing damage and freezing them temporarily in a time bubble, stunning them.
abilities.notes: Has a chance to proc on each attack, dealing bonus magical damage and stunning the target.

abilities.name: Chronosphere
abilities.description: Creates a sphere of chronofield that freezes all units caught in its radius. Only Faceless Void can move freely within the sphere.
abilities.notes: Freezes all units (enemies and allies) in the radius except for Faceless Void. Pierces spell immunity.
